title: Luteolin-Rich Fraction fromDracocephalum lindbergii: Promising Agent for Hypertension Treatment.
abstract: High blood pressure is one of the most critical issues in maintaining health; it requires prevention and management methods. In traditional medicine, the combination of medicinal plants was usually used to control high blood pressure. One of these plants isDracocephalum lindbergii. Therefore, this article examines the vasodilating effects of the flavonoid fractions of this plant and deals with this extract as a new suggestion for the prevention and control of high blood pressure.
